notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Open Access funding was enabled and organized by Project DEAL and implemented by Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT). The research carried out for this article is a result of the Federal Ministry of Education and Research funded Kopernikus project Energy Transition Navigation System for the detection, analysis and simulation of systemic interconnections (ENavi), Subproject J0 (funding code 03SFK4J0).
